text: haey mea la ai kat kaban haw ke( hsaa kari yea) khn del keat kampoungte chhr sa la t nowkanleng korp sakkar tha pit brakd nasa a l laoh phdal damnoeng rikreay dl anak aoy meankaun chhmoh yah yea daembi banhcheak nouv bantoul pit robsa a l laoh( knong kar bangkeut ai sa) chea anakdoeknoam ning chea anak theroksaa khluonobran pi kar ruomrk cheamuoy sdrei ning chea na pi mneak knongchamnaom anak del la troemotrauv
